10.eng-name: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Malik bin Al-Huwairith said:"I came to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) with a cousin of mine" - once he said, "with a friend of mine" - and he said: 'When you travel, call the Adhan and Iqamah, and let the older of you lead the prayer

chapter.eng-name: Those who are older going forward (to lead the prayer)
